io.spine.server.entity

Class VisibilityGuard

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.VisibilityGuard

  • @Internal
public final class VisibilityGuard
extends java.lang.Object
    A registry of repositories that controls access to them depending on the visibility of corresponding entity states.
    See Also:
    EntityOptions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Obtains a set of entity type names by their visibility.

      Obtains the repository for the passed entity state class.

      static VisibilityGuard newInstance()
      Creates a new instance of the guard.
      void register(Repository<?,?> repository)
      Registers the passed repository with the guard.
      void shutDownRepositories()
      Closes all registered repositories and clears the registration list.

        Verifies if there is a registered repository for the passed entity state class.

      • getRepository

        public java.util.Optional<Repository> getRepository(java.lang.Class<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message> stateClass)
        Obtains the repository for the passed entity state class.
        Parameters:
        stateClass - the class of the state of entities managed by the repository
        Returns:
        the repository wrapped into Optional or Optional#empty() if the entity state is not visible
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the repository for the passed state class was not registered with the guard prior to this call, or if all repositories were shut down

      • getEntityTypes

        public java.util.Set<io.spine.type.TypeName> getEntityTypes(io.spine.option.EntityOption.Visibility visibility)
        Obtains a set of entity type names by their visibility.

      • shutDownRepositories

        public void shutDownRepositories()
        Closes all registered repositories and clears the registration list.
